## Parts of speech
```{r}
sent <- "This is a sample sentance for parts of speech !!. This is @Wow :-)"
sent <- as.String(sent)
# sentAnnotator <- Maxent_Sent_Token_Annotator()
annotate_sent <- annotate(sent, Maxent_Sent_Token_Annotator())
(wordAnnotator <- annotate(s = sent, f = Maxent_Word_Token_Annotator(probs = T), a = annotate_sent))

(posAnnotator <- annotate(s = sent, f = Maxent_POS_Tag_Annotator(probs = T), a = wordAnnotator))


```
